attributes.action: Stop HS2 - keep businesses viable through Covid-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: The government should be using public money to keep businesses afloat during the Covid-19 pandemic and not wasting it on HS2 that the majority of the country does not need or want - this is a systemic failure of this country’s peers . Save the country’s businesses today from collapsing today !
attributes.background: Do not use public money building HS2 and instead invest it now to keep businesses viable through the Covid-19 pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311642
